p:
We present results from a series of case studies. For the first three cases, we consider a situation with only a single settlement. Unless stated otherwise, the values of the constants remain at that defined in table 2. Unless stated otherwise, for the numerics, we use the following initial conditions: S 0 = 2 000 000,
I
0
A
= 1
,
I
0
B
= 1
, J 0 = 75 000 000, Z 0 = 4 000 000, M 0 = 3 996 000, X 0 = 2000 and Y 0 = 2000. State variables not specified are initialized at 0. All computations were undertaken in M atlab and code is available here: https://osf.io/vspxe/ [ 28].
